CERTAIN TAX RETURN PREPARERS REQUIRED TO FILE RETURNS ELECTRONICALLY. Section 6011 of the Internal Revenue Code is amended to require tax return preparers to file individual income tax returns on magnetic media if they are specified tax return preparers for the calendar year. Tax return preparers must file individual income tax returns on magnetic media if they are specified tax return preparers for the calendar year and expect to file more than 100 returns. The term 'specified tax return preparer' refers to any tax preparer who expects to file more than 100 individual income tax returns in a calendar year. The term 'individual income tax return' includes returns for individuals, estates, or trusts.
